meanings.definition: To carve, cut, or etch into a surface
meanings.sent1: She carefully engraves her initials on the tree trunk.
meanings.sent2: The artist engraves intricate designs on metal plates.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel engraves its name on the park bench.
meanings.sent4: His words engrave a lasting memory in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The master craftsman engraves his signature on each piece he creates.

meanings.sent1: The kind gesture engraves gratitude in my heart.
meanings.sent2: Her dedication engraves a sense of loyalty in her team.
meanings.sent3: The puppy engraves joy in the hearts of everyone it meets.
meanings.sent4: The breathtaking view engraves a sense of wonder in my soul.
meanings.sent5: His courage engraves admiration in the minds of those around him.
